data.title: feat(limits): add --timeout and --max-output resource limits
data.description:
Adds resource limits for agent lifecycle management:

- --timeout <secs>: auto-kill agents after N seconds (SIGTERM then SIGKILL after 5s grace)
- --max-output <bytes>: cap transcript buffer size
- ExitReason enum distinguishes normal/timeout/killed exits
- Limits visible in 'botty list --json' output

Key files:
- src/cli.rs: new CLI flags
- src/protocol.rs: ResourceLimits and ExitReason types
- src/server/agent.rs: timeout checking logic
- src/server/mod.rs: timeout enforcement in pty_reader_task

Request security review for signal handling and architecture review for protocol changes.

data.reason: Fixed: Now using millisecond precision for timeout checking
Fixed: Exit reason now checks exit code (143/137) to confirm timeout kill
Addressed: Signal failure is logged at warn level; mutex ensures no race
Not applicable to this change - this is attach mode, timeout only applies to background agents
